script.name: !fight.war.protectsector
script.description: War Scripts: Attack player assests in sector

line.text: is a new script version available

line.comment: * Brent: insert a continue here to skip the ship spawning. Use a short delay,
* in case that helps reduce script overhead. Keep other code above, so that
* any existing ships are still handled normally.
* Use a 10 second wait, similar to what shows up below, so that the script
* loop rate doesn't change much (in case it matters somehow). Could maybe
* increase this as well, but performance benefits are likely negligible.
* players in sector, we dont need to create ships
* allow a few seconds before forces are launched
* get the ships we need to attack the sector
* find the race of the ships
* create the ships need to defend

sval.val: War Scripts: Attack player assests in sector
Brent: insert a continue here to skip the ship spawning. Use a short delay,
in case that helps reduce script overhead. Keep other code above, so that
any existing ships are still handled normally.
Use a 10 second wait, similar to what shows up below, so that the script
loop rate doesn't change much (in case it matters somehow). Could maybe
increase this as well, but performance benefits are likely negligible.
players in sector, we dont need to create ships
allow a few seconds before forces are launched
get the ships we need to attack the sector
find the race of the ships
create the ships need to defend
